newsitem.title: SPAIN: Madrid stocks' gains eroded by profit-taking.
newsitem.headline: Madrid stocks' gains eroded by profit-taking.

text.p: Stocks in Madrid closed below their highs for the day, as profit-taking and lower bond prices eroded earlier gains.
The general index finished up 0.67 points at 358.48 and the Ibex-35 gained 8.93 points to 4,084.46.
Telefonica fell five pesetas to 2,385 on profit-taking while paper firm ENCE gained, helped by a Goldman Sachs buy recommendation earlier this month, and finished up 85 pesetas at 1,915.
Repsol fell ahead of first half results due later this week and expected to show a 13 percent fall in its operating margin.
